oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: In The Heart Of A Fool - Johnnie Ray performance - 1960
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance of In The Heart Of A Fool, as performed by Johnnie Ray (performer) and written by Wayne P. Walker (songwriter) and Mel Tillis (songwriter/performer). Recorded and published in 1960 by Cedarwood Publishing Company.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Johnnie Ray
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) In The Heart OF A Fool (Johnnie Ray)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Walker, Wayne, 1925-1979; Tillis, Mel; Cadence Cloggers; Ray, Johnnie, 1927-1990
